Articles.Content:
There's an iOS game called Battleship Craft that was discontinued by the company Phyzios. The game was very popular, and many fans of the game, including myself, were heartbroken when they stated that is was to be discontinued.

The game was surprisingly intricate despite its simple graphics. It was primarily block-based. You could build your own warships, ranging from early World War II styles to more modern styles, down to the smallest detail. You could then take your vessels into combat in specific player vs AI missions or multiplayer battles.

It was a free game, which may explain why it was discontinued. However, perhaps Squad could pick it up from where Phyzios left off. It's popular enough to start selling for a small amount of money.
I've had fun playing that, however i doubt squad is interested in making the arrangements to continue its development.
It's more wishful thinking than anything. I want that game to be continued so bad.
I don't know why they discontinued it, it was a great game and I would've gladly uninstalled it and then bought it.
